means: 部署兵力( array的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Cartons of Chinese food were arrayed on a large oak table.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一张宽大的橡树桌上摆放着一盒盒中式食品。

sentence.Network_en: She was arrayed in a black velvet gown.
sentence.Network_cn: 她穿着一件黑色天鹅绒长礼服。

sentence.Network_en: They arrayed themselves before the general.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在将军面前排列成队.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The army was arrayed before the commander ., 队伍在指挥员面前排好队形.
Satan and his host have ever been arrayed against those who bear the message of warning and who reprove sins .撒旦与其全军一直在列阵对抗那些担负警告信息与斥责罪恶之人。
My home on the windowsill , arrayed landscape bonsai pot ., 我家的窗台上 , 摆着一盆山水盆景.
banners are arrayed on the wall ., 墙上张挂着锦旗.

list.abs: antenna aperture 天线孔径antenna array 天线阵antenna circuit 天线电路
■ 关联数组 (Associative array)：使用字符串键来标识各个元素的数组。■ 字典 (Dictionary)：其项目由一对对象 （称为键和值）组成 …
第2种方法是对产品芯片进行阵列模式(array mode)检测。阵列模式分析较随机模式更为方便，这是因为感兴趣的缺陷可在电压对比扫 …
磁盘阵列（Disk Array）是由一个硬盘控制器来控制多个硬盘的相互连接，使多个硬盘的读写同步，减少错误，增加效率和可靠度的技 …

entry.def: If things are arrayed in a particular way, they are arranged or displayed in that way.

example.ex: Cartons of Chinese food were arrayed on a large oak table.
example.tran: 在一张宽大的橡树桌上摆放着一盒盒中式食品。

example.ex: ...how molecules are arrayed in materials such as plastics and other polymers.
example.tran: 在塑料和其他聚合物材料中，分子如何排列

entry.def: If something such as a military force is arrayed against someone, it is ready and able to be used against them.

example.ex: The trouble with all such proposals is that so many powerful interests are arrayed against them...
example.tran: 所有这类提案遇到的困难是有太多强大的利益集团表示反对。

example.ex: Napoleon ultimately failed in his plan to defeat the two armies arrayed against him.
example.tran: 拿破仑计划击溃那两支列队待战的部队，却最终失利。

entry.def: If someone is arrayed in particular clothes, especially attractive or beautiful ones, they are dressed in those clothes.

example.ex: Sabrina has discarded her habitual boilersuit and is arrayed in black mini and tights.
example.tran: 萨布丽娜脱下平日穿的工作服，换上了黑色的超短裙和连裤袜。

auth_sentence.res_content: I asked about Saleh and the forces arrayed against her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I asked about Saleh and the forces arrayed against her.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Big surveyed the group of journalists arrayed before him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Big surveyed the group of journalists arrayed before him.
